dialogue.name: Chuuni
dialogue.dialogueText: As sure as I can be about anybody.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Chuuni didn’t give me any other information than that, but her stare of hostility was beyond crazy.

dialogue.name: Chuuni
dialogue.dialogueText: The detention session he gave me showed for sure that he was evil!

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: What is she talking about? A detention session? Wait was he the teacher that she had detention with? What did he do to her?

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Chuuni-Chan, what did he do to you?

dialogue.name: Chuuni
dialogue.dialogueText: He made me sit in absolute silence for an hour, each session so he could nap! If I even so much as coughed he would wake up and then get mad at me...a true demon!

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Wait is that really a reason to punish this guy!? What is she talking about!?

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Chuuni-Chan, maybe you shouldn’t use your personal feelings to decide who is and isn’t a villain!
